Package com.mta.tehreer.sfnt

Provides classes related to SFNT font format.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    OpenTypeFeature
    Represents an OpenType Layout feature.
    SfntTag
    Provides static utility methods related to SFNT tags.
    ShapingEngine
    The ShapingEngine class represents text shaping engine.
    ShapingResult
    A ShapingResult object is a container for the results of text shaping.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ShapingOrder
    Specifies the order in which the text is shaped.
    WritingDirection
    Specifies the writing direction of text.

Package com.mta.tehreer.sfnt Description

Provides classes related to SFNT font format.
